item.title: HTML5 Up and Running
item.description: I preordered Mark Pilgrim’s HTML5, Up and Running from Amazon back in March. It’s available for free as Dive into HTML5. I’ve been a fan of Mark’s writing for a while, so buying the book was a way to thank him “with a buck”. Interestingly, the online book and paper book are not identical. For starters, the titles are different. In addition, the beautiful fonts and cutesy images of the online version are gone.
